title: Find {x} x is a number whose absolute value is 94? - Quora

response.answer_text: It is the set [math]\{x \in X: |x|=94\}[/math] where [math]X[/math] is the space wherein you are looking for solutions. For [math]X=\C[/math] the answer is [math]\{94e^{i\theta}:0\leq \theta <2\pi\}.[/math]
Duh, maybe it’s somewhere around 94. That’s just a guess. Yes I would say it’s 94. Maybe.
